official_title: A bill to amend the Arms Control and Disarmament Act in order to extend the authorization for appropriations, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Arms Control and Disarmament Act to authorize appropriations for FY 1986 and 1987 to carry out such Act. Provides that the Deputy Director of the U.S. Arms Control and Disarmament Agency shall be compensated at level III on the Executive Schedule. Provides that the Assistant Directors of such Agency shall be compensated at level IV on the Executive Schedule.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Arms Control and Disarmament Act in order to extend the authorization for appropriations, and for other purposes.
